LOREASSISTANT.Title: AI Lore Assistant
LOREASSISTANT.Description: An intelligent lore assistant for world-building and storytelling

ApiKey.Name: OpenAI API Key
ApiKey.Hint: Your OpenAI API key from https://platform.openai.com/api-keys

Model.Name: AI Model
Model.Hint: The OpenAI model to use for generating content

MaxTokens.Name: Max Tokens
MaxTokens.Hint: Maximum number of tokens in the response (affects length and cost)

Temperature.Name: Creativity (Temperature)
Temperature.Hint: Controls randomness. Lower values are more focused, higher values are more creative

AutoSave.Name: Auto-save Responses
AutoSave.Hint: Automatically save interesting responses as journal entries
